Html:
Hello,

In my AR application I loaded a model of a solar system.
This model is an animation .FBX
I could see the model in augmented reality only as a static image, but I'm having difficulty understanding how to integrate classes (AnimatedModelLoader etc.) of the tutorial 14 Skinned Model Animation
someone has already done something about this kind of application
thanks for attention

Giacomo

You will need something different from the SkinnedModel tutorial for your case.

I can't give you the exact instructions now since I haven't done it myself yet.

Ohan
